comments:
Running on last Eclipse 3.3 milestone and got this error on restart.

This happens when running on an unsupported version of Eclipse (e.g. latest dev build on 3.3M2).  If you verify that your install is compatible as per the listings on the download page please reopen, but I can not reproduce.

(In reply to comment #1)
> This happens when running on an unsupported version of Eclipse (e.g. latest dev
> build on 3.3M2).  If you verify that your install is compatible as per the
> listings on the download page please reopen, but I can not reproduce.

I am running official 3.3M3 I20061102-1715

I just spent another 1/2 hour trying to reproduce this but can't.  I installed a fresh 3.3M3 and a fresh Mylar for 3.3M3.  

Do you have more than one version of Mylar installed?  The 3.3M3 version and latest dev build do not make any references to TypeInfoFactory, and the version that you have installed seems to be making that reference.
